src="http://l2.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/S5z3ae_.rs9iwHJKfb1J2w--/YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b247aD04Njt3PTEzMDs-/http://media.zenfs.com/en_us/News/Reuters/2018-02-18T162958Z_1_LYNXNPEE1H0EY_RTROPTP_2_TENNIS-ROTTERDAM-MEN.JPG" width="130" height="86" alt="Federer cruises past Dimitrov to claim Rotterdam title" align="left" title="Federer cruises past Dimitrov to claim Rotterdam title" border="0" ></a>Federer, 36, who became the oldest men's world number one after his semi-final victory on Saturday, broke his Bulgarian opponent early in the contest and cruised to a one-set lead at the Ahoy Rotterdam.  Playing flawless tennis, the 20-times major winner carried the momentum forward in the second set to seal the match in 55 minutes for his 97th career title and third in Rotterdam.  The Swiss, who won the Australian Open last month, also improved his head-to-head record against world number five Dimitrov to 7-0.<p><br clear="all"></description><link>https://cricket.yahoo.com/news/federer-cruises-past-dimitrov-claim-rotterdam-title-162958956--ten.html</link><pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 11:29:58 -0500</pubDate><source url="http://www.reuters.com/">Reuters</source><guid isPermaLink="false">federer-cruises-past-dimitrov-claim-rotterdam-title-162958956--ten.html</guid><media:content height="86" url="http://l2.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/S5z3ae_.rs9iwHJKfb1J2w--/YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b247aD04Njt3PTEzMDs-/http://media.zenfs.com/en_us/News/Reuters/2018-02-18T162958Z_1_LYNXNPEE1H0EY_RTROPTP_2_TENNIS-ROTTERDAM-MEN.JPG" width="130"/><media:text type="html"><p><a href="https://cricket.yahoo.com/news/federer-cruises-past-dimitrov-claim-rotterdam-title-162958956--ten.html"><img src="http://l2.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/S5z3ae_.rs9iwHJKfb1J2w--/YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b247aD04Njt3PTEzMDs-/http://media.zenfs.com/en_us/News/Reuters/2018-02-18T162958Z_1_LYNXNPEE1H0EY_RTROPTP_2_TENNIS-ROTTERDAM-MEN.JPG" width="130" height="86" alt="Federer cruises past Dimitrov to claim Rotterdam title" align="left" title="Federer cruises past Dimitrov to claim Rotterdam title" border="0" ></a>Federer, 36, who became the oldest men's world number one after his semi-final victory on Saturday, broke his Bulgarian opponent early in the contest and cruised to a one-set lead at the Ahoy Rotterdam. ArsenalFan TV by claiming that ‘some people just can’t take opinions about themselves’" border="0" ></a>Hector Bellerin has hit back at ArsenalFanTV in an ongoing row between the Arsenal defender and the supporter-based YouTube channel, claiming that “some people just can’t take opinions about themselves”. Serie A lead with 1-0 win over Torino" align="left" title="Juventus regain Serie A lead with 1-0 win over Torino" border="0" ></a>Turin, Feb 18 (IANS) Six-time defending champions Juventus on Sunday won the derby against Torino 1-0 to provisionally jump to the top of the Serie A table.  Juventus registered their ninth straight victory in the Italian football league to regain the lead in the standings, even though forward Gonzalo Higuain left the field in the 15th minute due to an ankle problem, reports Efe.
